trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Mounds
There were no other sightings in Mounds on or around September 30th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI'm a astrology nut so im always lookin the sky, where i live its very dark and u can see the stars and planets really good. Just about everynight for the last 6 months between 11:00 pm and 3:00 am - hovering above the tree line looking west toward the city of mounds.(i live on hwy 75 south) i can see with my eyes or i look thru the telescope or binoculras i see a bright light that is yellowish orange or sometimes bluish green the shape is bell shaped. it sits there- some times it moves a little but then it suddenly leaves. I have taken pictures but it only looks likes a bright star or planet i dont have a good enough camera. My neighbor has also seen this and today is October 16, 2010 and we have seen it alot in the last 2 weeks.so thats why im reporting this.---I have lived in mounds for 9 yrs and have seen some very weird and unexplainable things in the dark skies.
Summary: yellow orange bluish green object that moves very fast
